data.title: Christian Leaders Alliance
data.text:
Constance Vega is a mother of four girls; She is am a Cameroonian by birth, a native from Kumbo Bui Division to be precise and British by nationality.

She is the sixth from a family of seven siblings. She was married but now divorced because her husband became an unbeliever and refused to be converted.

In 1992, there was a life broadcasting program by evangelist Bill Graham in Cameroon, and that was the year She openly confessed the Lord Jesus Christ, She invited Him into her life, and He became my Lord and personal Savior.

She found herself in Italy where she met an American couple who started a house fellowship. At this fellowship, she started sensing a calling to ministry.

Constance began Christian Leaders Institute in 2018 and she was ordained in 2018. She is willing to mentor Christian Leaders Institute students and graduates and help them through the process of ordination.
